message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you. Given its unique value proposition, I'm offering it at $2,200,000. I believe this price accurately reflects its worth and potential return on investment for you.

I'm very interested in the product, but $2,200,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and my budget constraints.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. I understand your budget considerations, however, the value of this product is truly unique.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000. I believe this price point reflects the product's true worth while acknowledging your interest.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1,900,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price.
